ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Seeing as it is a required course, the issue of recommendation is a moot point. Still, I am glad that we had to take this class, as I do think it was helpful in ways I hadn't even anticipated. It is a lot of work, so I would warn fellow students to be prepared for that, but it is an enjoyable and useful class.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course didn't contribute to my dissertation/research, but it was very helpful in deepening my knowledge of one aspect of my profession. While my eventual goal is to teach literature courses, I will almost certainly have to teach language courses at some point, even once I finish with my departmental teaching requirements here. This course will make me a better teacher, and a more attractive job candidate, I believe.
This course did not contribute to my research, but it did prepare me to be a very good Spanish teacher.
